description: Jason Michaels finishes his shift, but a chance encounter with Nick Capra convinces him to log in some overtime. He fucks his hirsute hired hand with nonstop thrusts until they both shoot their wads - Nick spritzing Jason's face with his goo before he licks it clean.
title: Nightwatchmen, Scene #01
